title: Some New World Bonds Surge Over 200% as Builder Seeks Stability
description: New World Development Co.’s recent bond rally has added to gains over the past year that have lifted some of its securities out of distressed territory, while the price of four of its notes have more than tripled as the builder works to further shore up its liquidity.
content: New World Development Co.’s recent bond rally has added to gains over the past year that have lifted some of its securities out of distressed territory, while the price of four of its notes have more than tripled as the builder works to further shore up its liquidity.
